title: Man... I need a drink....
body:
Life's been crazy
Wife's been crazy

and on top of all this its close to me getting my bachelor's (after I changed majors) which means I am being stuffed with all these crazy assignments, i had a 14 page page due last week, a 12 page paper due this week, and an insurance case study due next week on top of next week being finals week. 

week after that i will be hitting the ground running looking to find a good job. I hate the whole job search and apply process... its so tedious

fml, sometimes a beer just sounds too good.

cheers mates.
